text: jo log[1] allaah aur usake rasool se yudhd karate hon tatha dharatee mein upadrav karate phir rahe hon, unaka dand ye hai ki unakee hatya kee jaaye tatha unhen phaansee dee jaaye athava unake haath-paanv vipareet dishaon se kaat diye jaayen athava unhen desh nikaala de diya jaaye. ye unake lie sansaar mein apamaan hai tatha paralok mein unake lie isase bada dand hai
